transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Yes.

Executive: Ji namaskar sir Ayush bol raha hu.

Customer: Ji hello.

Executive: Yes sir bataiye Vivek baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.

Customer: Hmm maine do mahine pehle IndiaMART ka ye subscription liya hai na.

Executive: Haan.

Customer: Iske abhi tak certificate kyu nahi mila mere ko ab tak?

Executive: TrustSeal ka TrustSeal ka plan liya hua hai aapne hai na?

Customer: Kya hua?

Executive: TrustSeal ka subscription liya hua hai na aapne?

Customer: Haan haan.

Executive: Haan toh aapko online toh mil gaya hoga physically roop mein aapko deliver nahi hua hoga hai na?

Customer: Haan toh unhone bataya tha ki saat din ke andar ho jayega yaha do mahine se upar ho gaya.

Executive: Haan haan saat din ke andar woh online wala ho jata hai aur jo physically aapko delivered jo hota hai na woh 45 days ke thoda ho jata hai usme underground mein lekin kya ek problem aa gayi thi ki abhi Diwali festival tha na is wajah se thoda kya delay ho gaya tha. Waise bhi line up par hoga aapko thode dino mein kya hai deliver ho jayega ghar se.

Customer: Pehle aapke yaha se nikla bhi hai ki nahi nikla hai woh toh bataiye.

Executive: Nahi nahi ek saath nikalta hai aisa nahi matlab aapka woh toh deliver toh hoga hi aapka kyunki aapne subscription leke rakha hua hai online aapko mil chuka hai woh. Hai na online toh aapne check kar hi liya hoga.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Haan toh online aapko mil chuka hai uske alawa jo aapko physically jo aapko delivered hota hai aapke address pe woh kuch within kuch seven to 10 days ke andar aapko mil jayega. Uske alawa agar main aapke mujhe aap company ka naam bata dijiye main check kar lu ek baar aur apni team ko bhej dunga aapki company ka naam toh aapko daily delivered ho jayega idhar check karke bata diya jayega usme.

Customer: Aisa toh mere ko ek mahine pehle bhi bola gaya tha ki aap company ka naam bataiye sab cheez karke dete hain 10 din ke andar aa jayega abhi tak toh nahi hai ek mahine pehle bhi maine call kiya tha.

Executive: Company ka naam bata dijiye zara mujhe.

Customer: Riddhi Siddhi Council Manufacturer.

Executive: Aage?

Customer: Riddhi Siddhi.

Executive: Riddhi Siddhi hai na? Ek second.

(silence)

Executive: Ek second dijiye zara.

(silence)

Executive: Ah Bharat ji baat kar rahe hain aap shayad na?

Customer: Nahi Maniklal baat kar rahe hain.

Executive: Ek second.

(silence)

Executive: Ek minute dijiye zara na.

(silence)

Executive: Ah sir zara mobile number batayenge aapka jo registered hai company ka?

Customer: 76318.

Executive: 76318

Customer: 00

Executive: 00

Customer: 871

Executive: 871

Executive: Maniklal ji hai na?

Customer: Ji.

(silence)

Executive: 18 September ko aapne liya tha jo plan aap bol rahe hain subscription liya tha aapne hai na?

Executive: Main aapki query jo hai kal se send kar deta hu apni team ko woh team check karke aapko main kal kal ya parso ke time pe ek baar aur connect karke bata dunga apni side se hai na?

Customer: Kal ya parso batayenge mujhe?

Executive: Haan main parso ke time pe aapko confirmly connect karke bata dunga ki aap jo hai aapka kab tak deliver ho jayega aapke paas. Idhar se aapki jo query hai raise kar dunga idhar se main aapki ticket meri side se aapki Riddhi Siddhi ah Council Manufacturers ki aapko jo certificate hai aapko physically send delivered ho gaya hai ya kitne din mein delivered hoga aapko confirmly parso tak aapko bata dunga.

Executive: Okay sir?

Customer: Theek hai dekhte hain parso tak aap kar bhi paate hain ya abhi toh aap log call bhi nahi karte hain. Fir jab subscription plan khatam hone ko aayega usme toh din mein 25 baar call karenge sir le lijiye subscription le lijiye subscription. Hai na?

Executive: Ji sir 3 November ko hi aapke paas call gaya tha abhi kya hai month mein waise kya hai month mein aapke paas ek baar hi call aata hai follow up ke liye ki aapke paas jo hai leads wagera aa rahi hai ya nahi aa rahi hai koi aur issue wagera hai month mein ek baar aapke paas call jarur aata hai. Hai na? Main aapko ye toh aap log aage karne wale the na kyunki jaise maine call kiya toh aap log aage karne wale the.

Executive: November nahi 3 November ko aapke paas aaya tha na main bata raha hu aapko ah 8 sorry ek second.

Executive: 8 October ko sir maine hi call kiya tha aapko actually.

Customer: Theek hai.

Executive: Haan 8 October ko maine hi call kiya tha aapko 11 baje ke time pe 11:30 ke time pe.

Customer: Woh maine call kiya tha aapko hai na? Maine aapko call kiya tha yahi certificate ke regarding aur aapne kuch bataya hi nahi. Maine aapko uske ek din pehle bhi raat ko maine call kiya tha. Hai na 7 October ko.

Executive: Nahi uske pehle jarur mere se nahi hua hoga lekin 8 October mere se aapne baat kari thi us time pe aapne shayad mere se ye bola tha ki certificate aapko mila nahi hai toh maine bola tha sir woh kuch time mein mil jayega maine us time pe main aapko bol diya tha maine lekin kya Diwali ke chakkar mein shayad nahi gaya hoga toh main ek baar apne senior main phone unse connect karwa deta hu aapko thodi der mein aur aapki jo ID send kar deta hu uske baad aapko yaha total bata diya jayega confirmly kab tak mil jayega hai na?

Customer: Abhi toh aap toh drama karenge abhi kuch hai na?

Executive: Sir aapko subscription ka time aayega tab aap log call karenge nahi?

Executive: Nahi nahi aisa nahi hai sir aapko jo hai mere ko koi maje hai kya ki abhi ko party ne le liya hai mere ko paisa mil gaya. Main bata raha hu na main aapko bata toh raha hu sir November ke mahine tak aapko isi mahine mein hi aapko jo certificate aapko delivered ho jayega aapke address pe pahunch jayega. Ye main confirmly apni side se bol raha hu aapko. Subscription lene se pehle toh batate the ek hafte ke andar aapko physical aur online dono certificate milega.

Executive: Aapko online toh mil hi gaya hai na aisa toh hai nahi sir aapko ki nahi online mila nahi hai bas aapki physically jo delivered hona hai aapke address pe woh bhi jaisa online hai aapka woh bhi print hoke aapke jo seat par aayega woh bhi aisa. Woh kab tak milega bhai? Kab tak milega?

Executive: Sir dekhiye main woh date aapke paas nahi hai nahi?

Executive: Nahi nahi aisa nahi hai date aapke paas hamare paas nahi hai aisa nahi hota hai aapko dekhiye pehle baat ye hoti hai ki certificate aapko bataya jata hai toh aapko online toh online toh aapko halki halki mil hi jata hai aisa nahi hai. Are bhai online ki baat kar rahe hain hum aapse. Online ki baat kar rahe hain aapse hum offline ki baat kar rahe hain na.

Executive: Nahi online online toh aapko online toh aapko mil hi gaya hoga na sir. Are bhai online ki baat nahi kar rahe hain offline ki baat kar rahe hain na physical ki baat kar rahe hain hum.

Executive: Offline bhi sir aapko jo hai seat pe print hokar hi aayega toh main bata toh raha hu aapko ek mahine ke andar mil jayega. Toh kab aayega?

Executive: Is mahine mein aapke paas aa jayega sir.

Executive: Theek hai sir.

(silence)
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received TrustSeal certificate.

- Certificate was promised within 7 days.

- Feels executives only call when subscription expiring.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed online certificate received.

- Executive will check and update by day after.

- Executive will raise a ticket for the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to provide an update by day after.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, certificate, delivery, subscription
